data.question: Why don't scientists trust atoms?
data.answer_non_humorous: Because they are small and cannot be trusted.

data.question: Why was the math book sad?
data.answer_humorous: Because it had too many problems!

data.question: Why do we never tell secrets on a farm?
data.answer_humorous: Because the potatoes have eyes and the corn has ears!

data.question: What do you call fake spaghetti?
Why did the scarecrow win an award?
data.answer_humorous: Because he was outstanding in his field!
data.answer_non_humorous: Because he did a good job.

data.question: Why can’t your nose be 12 inches long?
data.answer_humorous: Because then it would be a foot!
data.answer_non_humorous: Because noses don’t grow that long.

data.question: What did one wall say to the other?
data.answer_humorous: I'll meet you at the corner!

data.question: Why don't skeletons fight each other?
What do you call cheese that isn’t yours?
data.answer_non_humorous: Cheese that doesn't belong to you.

data.question: What do you call an alligator in a vest?
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
data.answer_humorous: In case he got a hole in one!

data.question: Why don’t eggs tell jokes?
data.answer_non_humorous: They don’t have a sense of humor.

data.question: Why did the bicycle fall over?
What did the grape do when it got stepped on?
data.answer_humorous: Nothing but let out a little wine!

data.question: Why did the computer go to the doctor?
What do you call a bear with no teeth?
Why couldn’t the pony sing a lullaby?
What do you call a group of musical whales?
data.answer_non_humorous: A group of whales making sounds.

data.question: What kind of shoes do ninjas wear?
Why did the cookie go to the hospital?
What do you call a funny mountain?
Why did the tomato blush?
data.answer_humorous: Because it saw the salad dressing!

data.question: What do you call a cold dog sitting on a rabbit?
data.answer_humorous: A chili dog on a bun!
data.answer_non_humorous: A cold dog on a rabbit.

data.question: What happens when you eat aluminum foil?
Why do cows have hooves instead of feet?
What do you call a belt made of watches?
data.answer_non_humorous: A belt with watches on it.

data.question: Why did the banker switch careers?
Why are elevator jokes so classic?
data.answer_humorous: Because they work on so many levels!

data.question: Why was the broom late?
Why don’t crabs give to charity?
